Description: Homeopathy is a system of gentle holistic healing involving the use of precise concentrations and specific dosage to stimulate the body's own natural healing response so as to treat physical and emotional disorders with. This course covers the foundations of holistic homeopathy, providing you with the knowledge of popular homeopathic remedies and approaches so that you are able to recommend homeopathic remedies in a natural therapist framework. What you will learn: - Introduction to homeopathy - Principles of homeopathy - Modalities of remedies - Characteristic emotional features - Major method of treatments - Other complementary therapies - Holistic assessment and treatment - Client care plan - Ethical guidelines for practice - Consultation process Enrolment is simple.
